# Import Declaration Workflow ## Category: Customs ## Sector: Import/Export ## Steps: 1. Obtain import license/permit    (Amharic: የማስመጣች ፈቃድ/ፍቃድ ያግኙ) 2. Register on e-SW system    (Amharic: በኢ-ኤስዬ ስርዓት ላይ ይመዝግቡ) 3. Prepare commercial invoice    (Amharic: የንግድ ኢንቮይስ ያዘጋጁ) 4. Classify goods using HS codes    (Amharic: የኤችኤስ ኮዶችን በመጠቀም ምርቶችን ይመደቡ) 5. Calculate applicable duties and taxes    (Amharic: የሚተገበሩ ጉምራሾች እና ታክሶችን ያስሉ) 6. Submit import declaration    (Amharic: የማስመጣች መግለጫ ያስገቡ)

7. Upload required documents    (Amharic: ያስፈላጊ ሰነዶችን ይስቀሉ) 8. Pay duties and taxes    (Amharic: ጉምራሾች እና ታክሶች ይክፈሉ) 9. Clear goods through customs    (Amharic: ምርቶችን በየክስተቱ ያጽዱ) ## Requirements: - Valid import license - Commercial invoice - Packing list - Bill of lading or airway bill - Certificate of origin (if applicable) - Import permit for regulated goods - Insurance certificate (if applicable) ## Validation: - Verify HS code classification - Check duty calculation accuracy
- Validate document completeness - Confirm payment processing

# Export Declaration Workflow ## Category: Customs ## Sector: Import/Export ## Steps: 1. Obtain export license/permit    (Amharic: የመላኪያ ፈቃድ/ፍቃድ ያግኙ) 2. Register on e-SW system    (Amharic: በኢ-ኤስዬ ስርዓት ላይ ይመዝግቡ) 3. Prepare commercial invoice    (Amharic: የንግድ ኢንቮይስ ያዘጋጁ) 4. Classify goods using HS codes    (Amharic: የኤችኤስ ኮዶችን በመጠቀም ምርቶችን ይመደቡ) 5. Submit export declaration    (Amharic: የመላኪያ መግለጫ ያስገቡ) 6. Upload required documents    (Amharic: ያስፈላጊ ሰነዶችን ይስቀሉ) 7. Obtain shipping instructions

(Amharic: የመላኪያ መመሪያዎችን ያግኙ) 8. Clear goods through customs    (Amharic: ምርቶችን በየክስተቱ ያጽዱ) ## Requirements: - Valid export license - Commercial invoice - Packing list - Certificate of origin - Export permit for regulated goods - Phytosanitary certificate (for agricultural products) ## Validation: - Verify HS code classification - Check document completeness - Validate export permit - Confirm customs clearance

# VAT Filing ## Category: Tax ## Sector: Manufacturing ## Steps: 1. Register for e-Tax account at etrax.mor.gov.et    (Amharic: etrax.mor.gov.et ላይ ለኢ-ትክስ መለያ ይመዝግቡ) 2. Gather required documents: Business license, TIN, financial statements    (Amharic: ያስፈላጊ ሰነዶችን ያሰኩ: የቢዝነስ ፈቃድ, የትክስ መለያ ቁጥር, የሂኑድ መግለጫዎች) 3. Login to e-Tax portal    (Amharic: ወደ የኢ-ትክስ ፖርታል ይግቡ) 4. Navigate to VAT filing section    (Amharic: ወደ የቫት መግለጫ ክፍል ይሂዱ) 5. Enter sales and purchase data    (Amharic: የሽያጭ እና የግዢ ውሂብ ያስገቡ)

6. Calculate VAT payable    (Amharic: የሚከፈል ቫት ያስሉ) 7. Submit VAT return    (Amharic: የቫት መግለጫ ያስገቡ) 8. Make payment through digital channels    (Amharic: በዲጂታል ጣቢያዎች ክፍያ ያድርጉ) ## Requirements: - Valid TIN (Tax Identification Number) - Business registration certificate - Bank account for digital payments - Accounting records for the period ## Validation: - Verify TIN against business registration - Check calculation accuracy - Confirm digital payment receipt - Validate filing period

# Income Tax Filing ## Category: Tax ## Sector: Manufacturing ## Steps: 1. Register for e-Tax account 2. Prepare income and expense documentation    (Amharic: የገቢና የወጭ ሰነዶችን ያዘጋጁ) 3. Login to e-Tax portal    (Amharic: ወደ የኢ-ትክስ ፖርታል ይግቡ) 4. Access income tax filing section    (Amharic: ወደ የገቢ ግብ መግለጫ ክፍል ይድረሱ) 5. Enter business income details    (Amharic: የቢዝነስ ገቢ ዝርዝሮችን ያስገቡ) 6. Report allowable deductions    (Amharic: የተፈቀዱ መቅነሻዎችን ያመዝግቡ) 7. Calculate tax liability    (Amharic: የትክስ ኃላፊነት ያስሉ)

8. Submit return and make payment    (Amharic: መግለጫውን ያስገቡ እና ክፍያ ያድርጉ) ## Requirements: - TIN (Tax Identification Number) - Business registration - Financial statements - Expense documentation - Bank account for payments ## Validation: - Verify income against bank statements - Check expense deductions are allowable - Confirm tax calculation accuracy - Validate payment confirmation
